body.name: Gerrii Long Handle Indoor Broom Adjustable Dust Sweeping Angle Broom Soft Bristle Broom for House Kitchen Office Patio Lobby Outdoor Indoor Cleaning, 57.9 Inch (2 Pcs)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 9 mins
features: Broom Bulk: you will receive 2 pieces heavy duty commercial broom, each has 4 pieces of adjustable handles and 1 broom head, sufficient quantity can meet your sweeping and cleaning needs

Adjustable Indoor Broom: the handle of the heavy duty broom for wood floors is about 57.9 inches/ 147 cm in height, you can adjust the height according to your needs, fitting for kids and adults, please check about the size information before purchase

Angled Bristles: the head of the indoor broom has an angled bristles that features 45 degrees,can easily sweep the dirt and stains on floors and corners that hard to reach, the thoughtful design will bring you much more convenience

Quality Material: the indoor angle broom is composed of 2 parts, which is mainly made of quality metal and plastic material, sturdy and reliable, safe and strong, hard to break or deform, serving you for a long time

Multiple Use Occasions: our outdoor brooms for sweeping indoor have classic colors and styles, which can be widely applied to family use and commercial use, like indoors and outdoors, fitting for office, school, classes, markets, and more
body.description: Features: You can send this soft bristle broom to your neighbors, kids, families, relatives, colleagues when they move to another house, which is practical and useful, suitable for kitchen, bedroom, living room, and more This kitchen broom can be separated in several parts, which is convenient for you to store, you can put them in your cabinets, cupboards, trunk, and more. Specifications: Main material: metal and plastic Color: as shown Size: 57.8 inch in height Package includes: 2 Sets floor sweeping brooms Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.
